RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Artem Godin [artem.godin@gmail.com]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: AKAI Fire Integration
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: This tool allows to use AKAI Fire FL Studio controller with Renoise tracker. It packs quite a lot of no-nonsense Renoise features to be available at your fingertips. Note: I made it for myself, so it may or may not suit your tracking style ;)
